name: (Prototype) Crowned Chickens
description:
Hi :D!

Warnings first: This is a prototype. We are currently working on the game. Everything will change 3 (levels, graphics, sounds and musics are coming too.) (title may change as well)

In Crowned chickens you are royal blood chickens, but only one can rule. However, who can claim to be a king without a crown? And there is only one crown. So get it!
Fight for the crown and become the king! But be careful, keeping the crown on your head requires all your attention...
